text: @PressSec Herman Cain's last public appearance was appearing at Trump's Tulsa rally on June 20th without a mask. He posted an anti-mask tweet the day before that has since been deleted. A victim of coronavirus, today he is dead as a doornail. https://t.co/rS7iJMfDZB
